1#include <furi_hal_speaker.h>
2#include <furi_hal_gpio.h>
3#include <furi_hal_resources.h>
4#include <furi_hal_power.h>
5#include <furi_hal_bus.h>

7#include <stm32wbxx_ll_tim.h>
8#include <furi_hal_cortex.h>
9
10#define TAG "FuriHalSpeaker"
11
12#define FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER TIM16
13#define FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_CHANNEL LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1
14#define FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_PRESCALER 500
15#define FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_MAX_VOLUME 60
16
17static FuriMutex* furi_hal_speaker_mutex = NULL;
18
19// #define FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_NEW_VOLUME
20
21void furi_hal_speaker_init() {
22 furi_assert(furi_hal_speaker_mutex == NULL);
23 furi_hal_speaker_mutex = furi_mutex_alloc(FuriMutexTypeNormal);
24 FURI_LOG_I(TAG, "Init OK");
25}
26
27void furi_hal_speaker_deinit() {
28 furi_check(furi_hal_speaker_mutex != NULL);
29 furi_mutex_free(furi_hal_speaker_mutex);
30 furi_hal_speaker_mutex = NULL;
31}
32
33bool furi_hal_speaker_acquire(uint32_t timeout) {
34 furi_check(!FURI_IS_IRQ_MODE());
35
36 if(furi_mutex_acquire(furi_hal_speaker_mutex, timeout) == FuriStatusOk) {
37 furi_hal_power_insomnia_enter();
38 furi_hal_bus_enable(FuriHalBusTIM16);
39 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
40 &gpio_speaker, GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow, GpioAltFn14TIM16);
41 return true;
42 } else {
43 return false;
44 }
45}
46
47void furi_hal_speaker_release() {
48 furi_check(!FURI_IS_IRQ_MODE());
49 furi_check(furi_hal_speaker_is_mine());
50
51 furi_hal_speaker_stop();
52 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_speaker, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullDown, GpioSpeedLow);
53
54 furi_hal_bus_disable(FuriHalBusTIM16);
55 furi_hal_power_insomnia_exit();
56
57 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(furi_hal_speaker_mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
58}
59
60bool furi_hal_speaker_is_mine() {
61 return (FURI_IS_IRQ_MODE()) ||
62 (furi_mutex_get_owner(furi_hal_speaker_mutex) == furi_thread_get_current_id());
63}
64
65static inline uint32_t furi_hal_speaker_calculate_autoreload(float frequency) {
66 uint32_t autoreload = (SystemCoreClock / FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_PRESCALER / frequency) - 1;
67 if(autoreload < 2) {
68 autoreload = 2;
69 } else if(autoreload > UINT16_MAX) {
70 autoreload = UINT16_MAX;
71 }
72
73 return autoreload;
74}
75
76static inline uint32_t furi_hal_speaker_calculate_compare(float volume) {
77 if(volume < 0) volume = 0;
78 if(volume > 1) volume = 1;
79 volume = volume * volume * volume;
80
81#ifdef FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_NEW_VOLUME
82 uint32_t compare_value = volume * FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_MAX_VOLUME;
83 uint32_t clip_value = volume * LL_TIM_GetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER) / 2;
84 if(compare_value > clip_value) {
85 compare_value = clip_value;
86 }
87#else
88 uint32_t compare_value = volume * LL_TIM_GetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER) / 2;
89#endif
90
91 if(compare_value == 0) {
92 compare_value = 1;
93 }
94
95 return compare_value;
96}
97
98void furi_hal_speaker_start(float frequency, float volume) {
99 furi_check(furi_hal_speaker_is_mine());
100
101 if(volume <= 0) {
102 furi_hal_speaker_stop();
103 return;
104 }
105
106 LL_TIM_InitTypeDef TIM_InitStruct = {0};
107 TIM_InitStruct.Prescaler = FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_PRESCALER - 1;
108 TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload = furi_hal_speaker_calculate_autoreload(frequency);
109 LL_TIM_Init(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER, &TIM_InitStruct);
110
111 LL_TIM_OC_InitTypeDef TIM_OC_InitStruct = {0};
112 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCMode = LL_TIM_OCMODE_PWM1;
113 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_ENABLE;
114 TIM_OC_InitStruct.CompareValue = furi_hal_speaker_calculate_compare(volume);
115 LL_TIM_OC_Init(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER, FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_CHANNEL, &TIM_OC_InitStruct);
116
117 LL_TIM_EnableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER);
118 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER);
119}
120
121void furi_hal_speaker_set_volume(float volume) {
122 furi_check(furi_hal_speaker_is_mine());
123 if(volume <= 0) {
124 furi_hal_speaker_stop();
125 return;
126 }
127
128#if FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_CHANNEL == LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1
129 LL_TIM_OC_SetCompareCH1(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER, furi_hal_speaker_calculate_compare(volume));
130#else
131#error Invalid channel
132#endif
133}
134
135void furi_hal_speaker_stop() {
136 furi_check(furi_hal_speaker_is_mine());
137 LL_TIM_DisableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER);
138 LL_TIM_DisableCounter(FURI_HAL_SPEAKER_TIMER);
139}
